column4: any Xubuntu users who can help me set up a working VNC server?  i can connect, but get only a grey screen and X cursor.
i could be wrong (its been a while since i played with vnc) but i think you have to tell vnc to start xubuntu when the user connects, it starts startx by default
ok, i was playing around with the startup script for a bit, maybe i used the wrong command..
looks like i was using a bum server (tightvncserver).  installed x11vnc and all is well :-)
